main.title: Byld Ventures
main.headline: Institutional venture capital firm focused on early-stage fintech investments in the Middle East and Africa.
main.description: We are a small team of investors dedicated solely to the early chapters of company formation. We have an extensive track record of investinggffr in companies before they are incorporated. We tend to invest $250,000 to $1m in pre-seed rounds.

UK.title: UK
UK.src: <svg width="62" height="45" fill="none"><path d="M62 0H31.294v42.877H62V0z" fill="#fff"/><path d="M36 0h-5v43h5V0z" fill="#CC0001"/><path d="M30.583 2h-30v42.877h30V2z" fill="#fff"/><path d="M31 2h-5v43h5V2z" fill="#CC0001"/><path d="M.58 18v10h32V18h-32z" fill="#CC0001"/><path d="M30 16v10h32V16H30z" fill="#CC0001"/></svg>

data.name: Youcef Oudjidane
data.title: Founder and Managing Partner
description: Youcef is the co-founder of Elevate, a fintech startup providing non-US residents with a US bank account. He started his investing career with the Dubai Government and more recently, was a managing partner at Class 5 Global.
Youcef has an undergraduate degree in mathematics from the Univeristy of Nottingham.

data.name: Ahmed Sabbah
data.title: Venture Partner
description: Ahmed is the co-founder & CEO of Telda, a digital banking app in Egypt. Prior to founding Telda, Ahmed was the co-founder and CTO of Swvl (NASDAQ: SWVL).
Ahmed has an undergraduate degree in computer science from the German University in Cairo.

data.name: Shekinah Adewumi
data.title: Venture Partner
description: Shekinah is the co-founder & CEO of Apata, a fraud prevention provider for fintech issuers. Prior to founding Apata, Shekinah co-founded Touchtech Payments, which was acquired by Stripe in 2018.
Shekinah has an undergraduate degree in engineering from Dublin City University.

data.name: Kieran Gibbs
data.title: Venture Partner
description: Kieran is a professional football player, currently playing for Inter Miami. He began his professional career with Arsenal and went on to make more than 200 appearances for the club. He made his full England debut in 2010.

data.name: Khalid Al Saud
data.title: Associate
description: Prior to joining Byld, Khalid was an associate at Class 5 Global.
Khalid studied international business at Long Island University.

data.name: Khalil Osman
data.title: Associate
description: Before Byld, Khalil was at Visa in the corporate strategy and M&A division focusing on the CEMEA region. Additionally, he spent time in strategy consulting at Kearney between New York and Dubai.
Khalil has an undergraduate degree in economics from New York University.

philosophy.title: Philosophy
philosophy.caption: We back fintech startups in the Middle East and Africa

data.title: We love what we do
data.description: We are your most responsive investor.

data.title: We are competitive
data.description: We resemble the founders with iuhiued we back: restless with an abnormal desire to win.

data.title: We are optimistic
data.description: We’re comfortable with the unknowable’s and focus on what can go right, as opposed to what can go wrong.

data.title: We invest early
data.description: In most instances, before a line of code has been written.

data.title: We are nimble
data.description: We prefer to lead rounds. We move quickly and avoid unnecessary diligence.

data.title: We are active
data.description: We tend to work best with technical and resourceful founders that are yet to ship.

data.title: Freebank
data.description: Index Ventures | Canaan Partners | Raba Partnership

meta.keywords: Africa, venture capital, technology, startup, fintech
